text: Eric Emerson Schmidt (born April 27, 1955) is an American businessman and software engineer. He is known for being the Executive Chairman of Google from 2001 to 2015 and Alphabet Inc. from 2015 to 2017. In 2017, Forbes listed Schmidt as the 119th-richest person in the world, having US$11.1 billion. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Mobile World Congress 2010 Keynote: Eric Schmidt, CEO, Google (February 2010) * How Google Works (The best ideas, by TECHmED) * Class Action employee suit naming Schmidt * Shareholder suit naming Schmidt Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Google people Category:Engineers from Virginia Category:Businesspeople from Virginia Category:American software engineers
title: Eric Schmidt
